flowRoot.flowPara: = -x01 sin(wt) + x02 cos(wt) - v1 t sin(wt) + v2 t cos(wt)
= -x01 sin(wt) + x02 (cos(wt)-1) - v1 t sin(wt) + v2 t cos(wt)
|s - s(0)| <= |x01 sin(wt)| + |x02 (cos(wt)-1)| + |v1 t sin(wt)| + |v2 t cos(wt)|
= x01 (cos(wt) - 1) + x02 sin(wt) + v1 t cos(wt) + v2 t sin(wt)
|d - d(0)| <= |x01 (cos(wt) - 1)| + |x02 sin(wt)| + |v1 t cos(wt)| + |v2 t sin(wt)|
Ghost point motion: x_g(t) = x_g(0) + t [-x_g2(0) w, x_g1(0) w]
a can be adapted as far as f stays in a specific range (if f is inside the range)
in order to reduce h. Further reduction must go via b.
-x01 wt + x02 (wt)^2/2 - v1 t wt + v2 t
d/dt(.) = x01 w^2 t + x02 w + v1 + 2 v2 w t
